title: Fina AI - Expense tracker
description: Currently building an AI-powered iOS and web finance app that helps people track and manage all their finances in one place.
longDescription: Fina AI is a comprehensive financial management platform that leverages artificial intelligence to help users track expenses, manage budgets, and gain insights into their spending habits. Built for both iOS and web platforms.

title: SMB.co
description: Manage tasks efficiently and keep projects moving forward without unnecessary delays.
longDescription: SMB.co is a project management platform designed for small and medium businesses. It helps teams organize projects, track goals, and manage all their work from one place.

title: MercadoLibre
description: Organize projects, track goals, and manage all your team's work from one place.
longDescription: Worked on various projects at MercadoLibre, focusing on improving user experience and internal tooling for project management and team collaboration.
